title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Google details security measures for Chrome’s agentic features
items.description: Google details how it is enacting security guardrails before rolling out agentic capabilities on Chrome.

items.title: Adobe launches content creation hub in Premiere mobile for YouTube Shorts creators
items.description: The company says the space is designed to give creators everything they need to produce viral videos, grow their audience, and tap into trends, whethe...

items.title: IBM to acquire Confluent for $11B as it seeks to bolster its data offerings
items.description: IBM is buying data infrastructure company Confluent for $11 billion in cash in a bid to to bolster its data and automation products as ever more compa...

items.title: Hinge’s new AI feature helps daters move beyond boring small talk
items.description: Hinge launched “Convo Starters,” a feature powered by AI that provides personalized tips for initiating meaningful conversations.

items.title: Environmental groups call for halt to new data center construction
items.description: More than 230 organizations signed a public letter urging members of Congress to take action.

items.title: Tiger Global plans cautious venture  future with a new $2.2B fund
items.description: Tiger's last fund did well with investmetments in OpenAI, Waymo and Databricks. But it warns investors that AI valuations are already 'elevated.'

items.title: Claude Code is coming to Slack, and that’s a bigger deal than it sounds
items.description: Anthropic launches Claude Code in Slack, letting developers delegate coding tasks from chat threads. It's part of a shift toward AI-embedded collabora...

items.title: JBL Grip Review: A Bluetooth Speaker With Lava Lamp Vibes
items.description: This waterproof ultra-portable comes with a splash of party.

items.title: You can buy your Instacart groceries without leaving ChatGPT
items.description: Shoppers will be able to go from recipe planning to checkout within the ChatGPT window.

items.title: Paramount goes to war with Netflix for Warner Bros. Discovery with hostile $108.4B bid
items.description: Paramount Skydance on Monday launched a hostile, $108.4 billion bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, days after Warner Bros. agreed to be acquired by Ne...
